runs.comm: an outswinger from a good length on off stump, Smith prods outside off stump and is beaten
a fuller length, a wider line, and another outswinger. Smith tries to cover drive on the up and is beaten
Smith's nicked this but it's fallen well short of Dhoni. A bolt upright seam from Bhuvneshwar, pitching on a good length and swinging away from the right-hander
Smith makes crisp contact with a punchy drive but hits it to the fielder at cover
gets squared up a little on the back foot and gets a thick outside edge through gully for a single. That's five outswingers in a row
and now Bhuvneshwar finishes the over with an inswinger, which moves across Gayle who lets it go on the back foot
the short of a length delivery is too quick for Smith, who tries to pull but gets hit on the body as he is late on the shot
short of a length but the line is down leg side, he'll have to bowl that again
another ball wide down leg side, Smith tries to help it around the corner but it is too far away
that pitched on a good length around off and stopped on the batsman a little, Smith checked his forward push and blocked the ball on the leg side with a straight bat
Smith swivels and tries to pull again but the ball wasn't short enough, it skidded on to him and hit his thigh
Smith connects this time, pulling the short of a length ball to the fielder at deep backward square leg
Gayle stays back and taps one that moves away from him towards point

dropped! Gayle goes for the big drive against a full ball outside off and gets a thick edge, it flies to Ashwin at head height at first slip and he parries the ball. It lobs over his head, Kohli dives full length to his right from gully to try and catch it but fails to reach it, superb attempt
punched crisply to cover off the front foot
this one cuts into the right-hander and goes through the gap between bat and body, over the top of off and middle stump
too wide outside off stump this time, lots of seam movement away from the right-hander
defended from the crease on the leg side, a much straighter line
terrific swing bowling this, pitches on a length that has the batsman moving forward and nips away from around off stump, beating the outside edge
another one, a fuller length, a closer line, and delectable away movement from Smith, who prods with hope rather than conviction
simply too good for Smith, another outswinger beats the outside edge of a tentative prod from the crease
Shami bowls another wide down leg side, extras have contributed four to West Indies' six runs
Gayle tries to hit the ball hard off the back foot through cover but mis-times it
he's timed this better off the back foot towards mid-off but can't find the gap, West Indies are stagnant
and there he goes! Gayle steps out to a length ball, makes a little bit of room, gets under it, and pulls it over the deep midwicket boundary
played towards cover
that's travelled to the midwicket boundary so quickly, along the ground this time. Gayle moved outside leg to create hitting space and drilled a fuller ball through midwicket
a mighty mow connects with nothing, Gayle swung so hard at a short of a length ball but was beaten
an appeal for lbw but the batsman was well forward, Smith tried to flick a full ball but was beaten, they run a leg bye after the ball ricochets towards the off side
Gayle moves out of his crease but Bhuvneshwar counters with a perfectly pitched delivery that nips away from the left-hander and beats the bat, Gayle tries to block but fails.
a length ball on the pads, Gayle turns it behind square
an inswinger, Smith inside edges it on the leg side
Smith is caught in his crease as he tries to flick a ball that's a bit too full to stay back to, gets hit on the pads
defended back to the bowler from the crease
gets a bit of turn from off stump, Gayle steys back and defends
moves forward and turns the ball off his pads towards deep square leg, where Dhawan does the boundary riding, one of the batsmen did not complete a run, one-short signalled
played towards mid-on for a single
what a horrible line from Ashwin, far outside leg from round the wicket, Smith makes solid contact with the sweep and finds the long leg boundary
defended back to the bowler
pitches outside leg from round the wicket again, this time Smith fails to connect with the sweep
and Gayle sends him over the fielder on the long-on boundary. The ball was too full, Gayle got under it and smashed it
Yuvraj Singh has dropped a sitter!. Gayle aimed for the mow over the midwicket boundary and top edged the googly, Yuvraj had oodles of time to position himself but grassed it at deep midwicket
Smith top edges a swat across the line but it falls in no-mans land towards square leg
driven along the ground to long on for a single
driven back to the bowler
Smith stays back and taps the ball on the off side
a full toss on leg stump, Gayle had moved his front foot across towards the off so couldn't swing hard, he taps it through square leg
that's extremely wide outside leg stump from round the wicket - like a negative line in a Test match - Smith sweeps and hits the ball between the keeper and short fine leg
tries to sweep from outside leg but fails to make proper contact
attempts the reverse sweep this time and once again fails to connect

Smith's struggle has finally ended - 11 off 29 balls. That's going to hurt West Indies. He prodded from the crease at a delivery that stopped on him a little and it popped up towards silly mid off, Ashwin moved quickly to his left and dived to take the catch
Samuels is beaten outside off stump by one that slides across him
Gayle leans forward and across and flicks the ball through square, Gayle and Samuels amble the single
defended on the off side
pushed towards cover to the fielder
punched off the back foot but once again to the cover
played off the back foot to cover point
played to midwicket for a single
nudged off the pads for a single through square leg
Gayle lumbers for a quick single after Samuels dabs the ball towards point
Gayle steps out of his crease but is beaten by the flight of the ball, it spins away from the left-hander but Gayle manages to dab it behind point
driven to deep cover for one more
pushed gently down to long on for one more ...
Samuels tries to turn the ball on the leg side but does not connect with the carrom ball
Gayle attempts to heave over the leg side but gets hit on the pad, that was missing leg
steps forward and works the ball down to long on ...
Samuels comes forward but is beaten in the flight, he plays it back to the bowler
driven off the back foot along the ground to deep cover
that's fired down leg side from round the wicket, Gayle tries to slog sweep but misses, he has no room to work with
once again Raina fires it down leg side, bowling to a plan to deny Gayle hitting space
the ball stops on Gayle and spins away from him, Gayle pushes it towards cover point for a single
Raina dives to his right to cut off a Samuels push, he flings it back to Dhoni and the batsman has to scamper back
Gayle backs away and slaps the ball from close to off stump, can't beat cover
driven off the back foot towards deep cover, hit along the ground
Samuels punches off the back foot and Dhawan dives to his left at cover to bring the ball down
defended back to the bowler with a straight bat
that's very wide outside off stump and turned a lot as well
pushed from the crease towards mid-on for another single
finally Samuels has hit the back, punching off the back foot through cover, that should have been just two but Shami messes it up on the boundary
Gayle moves back and hits it down the ground with a flat bat, Raina prevents the boundary at long off
cut hard off the back foot but can't find the gap at point ...
Kohli comes running in from the deep and dives forward to try and catch it at deep midwicket but the ball falls short. Gayle slogged across the line and mis-hit another one ...
a full ball on off and middle, driven straight to cover
that's the googly and Samuels did not pick it, he mid-timed a drive to cover

Gayle's been run out, by miles. He's had a shocker today, though he made 34 off 33 balls. He barely middled anything. Samuels cut the ball straight to point and set off, Gayle responded but he's a really slow runner and had no chance once Shami fielded sharply and threw to Dhoni
defended back to the bowler
Samuels charges and lofts straight, placing it too fine for the long-on fielder
tries to go down the ground again but is cramped for room and hit on the pad
played towards deep midwicket and Kohli runs in quickly to prevent the second
that's down leg side and Samuels came out of his crease and turned it off his pads wide of the fielder at short fine leg, and too fine for deep square leg
it's a wide leg break outside off, spun away quite a bit too
a low full toss, driven firmly to cover, straight to the fielder
one hand comes off the bat as Simmons slogs across the line, he mis-hits it but the ball falls short of deep midwicket

stumped! Mishra tosses up a legbreak, Samuels comes forward but is hopelessly beaten in the flight, the ball dips and spins away from him, beating the bat. Dhoni lights up the bails. The third umpire isn't needed.

lbw! The googly does Bravo in. Mishra pitched just outside off and spun it back into the right-hander. Bravo pushed forward to a legbreak and was struck plumb in front. I haven't seen such a miserable T20 innings in a while
two slips for the hat-trick ball, it's full outside off and the batsman drives to long off
pushed off the back foot towards cover
Simmons makes room by moving outside leg and drills the ball inside out through extra cover, beating the fielder at long off to his left
nudged off the pads in front of square for two more
backs away outside leg and cuts the ball from leg stump to point
strays on to the pads, Simmons moves across and flicks behind square
defended back to the bowler
flat, wicket to wicket line, defended towards point
Simmons slashes at a good length ball outside off and does not connect
a slow bouncer from Shami and Simmons had played his pull before the ball arrived, he watched it loop over his shoulder
Dropped, Rohit flies to his left at cover but fails to hold on to a tough catch ... Simmons slapped a length ball in the air but placed it too close to the fielder
a full ball nearly in the blockhole outside off, Sammy jams his bat down at it and manages to squeeze the ball and place it fine enough to beat third man
that's extremely wide outside off stump
that's not as wide outside off but still wide enough to be called
Sammy tries to launch the ball over extra cover but gets a thick outside edge towards third man
this time he hits it where he meant it to go, Sammy gets under a full ball outside off and launches it towards deep extra cover with a full swing of the bat, the ball falls just short of the boundary
played off the back foot to point
Simmons clears his front foot and slogs, makes no proper contact but they sprint a single to short fine leg

caught on the edge of the long off boundary! Sammy biffed the flat ball with a flat bat but did not time the shot, it nearly went all the way but Rohit positioned himself well and took a well judged catch
cut hard but can't beat Dhawan at point
pulled hard along the ground to deep square leg

another excellent catch on the straight boundary, Simmons moves back and slogs down the ground, completely mis-hitting it ... Raina covers a lot of ground running to his left from long-on and catches it on the move ... but hang on the umpires are checking if Jadeja had overstepped. It's a tight call, don;t think any part of his heel was behind the line though. It's a no-ball, umpire Dharmasena signals a free hit.
and it's disappeared over the long-on boundary, Simmons gets under a full ball and golf-swings it over the fielder in the deep
Mishra rips the legbreak away from the right-hander and beats the cut
pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
Mishra bowls a really fast one that skids through outside off and beats the bat, really quick that was
and now he slows it up tantalisingly outside off, Russel heaves at the legbreak and is beaten
hit hard along the ground to long on
defended back to the bowler, Mishra dives to his left and fields
Russel slogs across the line and like so many others before him, he mis-times it. Kohli gets under it at deep midwicket and takes the catch comfortably
a bit too short, Simmons winds up and pulls hard, launching the ball over the deep midwicket boundary, Jadeja's not bowled at the right pace on this pitch. A bit too quick
that's also travelled far, Simmons lays into a full ball, getting under it and smashing it over long on
that's a marginal call from the umpire, it wasn't outside the guide line but the bowler had been penalised
caught at backward point, Dhawan fumbles but holds on! Simmons slogged once again but top edged it this time. the fielder moved from cover point to backward point and took it
wide outside off stump, this is definitely wide
Narine tees off this time, using the angle into him from over the wicket, moving forward and smashing it over deep square leg
driven through cover point for a single
